title: windows installer should not leave ; at the end of PATH after go is uninstalled
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. download windows installer from http://code.google.com/p/gomingw/downloads/list
2. check your path
echo %PATH%
...bin
3. install Go
4. uninstall Go
5 check your path
...bin;
6. install Go
7. uninstall Go
8 check your path
...bin;;
9 ... and so on ... every new install will add extra ; to the end of your PATH
environment variable
